title: Color Picker

title: Menu
description: Explore a dynamic restaurant menu with categories, prices, and images. You can filter dishes. I think this is a good project to spin off as a service for restaurants.

title: QR Code Generator w/ Logo
description: Generate custom QR codes with embedded logos. I made this because I thought it was funny people pay to generate QR codes.

title: Movie Database
description: This was one of the first projects I've ever built. Did it to explore APIs. Hardest part was the favorite button effect.
